price: (Ìṣesí àwọn aláìgbàgbọ́) dà bí ìṣesí àwọn ènìyàn Fir‘aon àti àwọn tó ṣíwájú wọn - wọ́n ṣàì gbàgbọ́ nínú àwọn āyah Allāhu. - Nítorí náà, Allāhu mú wọn nítorí ẹ̀ṣẹ̀ wọn. Dájúdájú Allāhu ni Alágbára, Ó le níbi ìyà.
arabic: كَدَأۡبِ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ كَفَرُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِذُنُوبِهِمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ قَوِيّٞ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: kadabi āli fir'ʿawna wa-alladhīna min qablihim kafarū biāyāti al-lahi fa-akhadhahumu al-lahu bidhunūbihim inna al-laha qawiyyun shadīdu al-ʿiqābi
